entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:57PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf, High Winds, And Heavy Rain Early This Week... A strong low pressure system is expected to bring elevated surf to south and west facing shores from the Yukon Delta to Point Hope Monday and Tuesday.
